description: Represents a subject within a Flywheel project, including metadata, relationships, and identifiers.

id.description: The unique identifier for the subject.
id.title: Subject ID

label.description: A human-readable label for the subject.
label.title: Subject Label

parents.group.description: The group associated with the subject.
parents.group.title: Parent Group

parents.project.description: The project associated with the subject.
parents.project.title: Parent Project

created.description: The timestamp when the subject was created.
created.title: Creation Timestamp

modified.description: The timestamp when the subject was last modified.
modified.title: Last Modified Timestamp

deleted.description: Indicates whether the subject has been deleted.
deleted.title: Deleted

firstname.description: The first name of the subject.
firstname.title: First Name

lastname.description: The last name of the subject.
lastname.title: Last Name

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the subject in ISO 8601 format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD).
date_of_birth.title: Date of Birth

cohort.description: The cohort to which the subject belongs.
cohort.title: Cohort

mlset.description: The machine learning set classification for the subject.
mlset.title: ML Set

source.id.description: The ID of the source object for the subject.
source.id.title: Source ID

source.type.description: The type of the source object for the subject.
source.type.title: Source Type

state.description: The current state of the subject, indicating its status within the project workflow.
state.title: Subject State

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the subject.

code.description: A unique code assigned to the subject for identification within the project.
code.title: Subject Code

copy_of.description: The ID of the subject this is a copy of.
copy_of.title: Copy Of

original_copy_of.description: The ID of the original subject this is a copy of.
original_copy_of.title: Original Copy Of
